content:
Me: "Oh no let's check in and see how Polonius is doing, it's such a shame I can't motivate working on it since it's too far from my work on weird specialised logics for automated theorem provers"
Meanwhile, in the Polonius WG: hey I implemented this weird specialised logic for theorem proving

(I still don't have time to work on Polonius, heck I don't have time to cook as it is, but I'm still working on finagling a way to get to do something for Polonius for work, though that gambit won't play out until after March probably)
